title: Argentum
description: Argentum . . . silver. Magical powers. The destruction of Alistair has brought a measure of peace and calm to those at P.A.W.S., but his silver charm remains in Miri's possession and it seems to almost have a life of its own. Nightmares and questions torment Miri until the charm mysteriously disappears and Jessamyn seeks help from Quentin, who claims to have repented his past association with Alistair. But can he be trusted? And what of Jenna? The young girl once held captive by Alistair, is carrying a terrible secret-a secret that could determine the future of P.A.W.S.
author: Debbie Manber Kupfer
